Class CommandHandler

java.lang.Object
bg.tu_varna.sit.a1.f22621621.utils.CommandHandler
public class CommandHandler extends Object
The type CommandHandler. It handles all user input and calls the necessary command.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run() throws InvalidCommandException
      Handles the user's input. Initializes a Map that contains all commands of the application and the key word used to invoke every command. Prints a welcome message and then uses the scanner to read each line of the user's input. Invokes a command if the line starts with a key word. Throws an InvalidCommandException and displays an error message if it fails to find a command.
      Throws:
      InvalidCommandException - if the first element of the user input is not a key word in the commands Map
